title: If you could start a band with any three people of your choice, who would they be? - Quora

response.answer_text: If I would start a band with any 3 people of my choice, where I will take the position of lead vocalist and rhythm guitar position, the following will be my band members and friends (although no way on Earth this would ever be possible lol): Bass - Sir Paul McCartney (a fantastic bassist who will also be the other lead vocalist because he is simply one of the greatest pop and rock singers to have ever lived) Drums - Ginger Baker (my favorite drummer of all-time, who is not just technically brilliant but also a rather versatile instrumentalist, capable of playing other genres such as jazz) Lead guitar - Eric Clapton (he will also be another lead vocalist besides just being the already amazing guitar player that he is) Basically, we will play rock/rock ‘n’roll/pop in the styles of The Beatles, Elvis Presley and Cream, together with influences from other bands/groups such as Simon & Garfunkel and The Beach Boys.

Keyboards: Jon Lord Vocals: Janis Joplin Drums: Keith Moon Jon would have to play the bass lines and I would share backing vocals with Keith. Notably, I am the only one living in my quartet. This might make concerts difficult.
